content: Disse a tutti che stava bene.
translations: eng:He told everybody he was fine
eng:He told everybody that he was fine
eng:He told everybody that he was well
eng:He told everyone he was fine
eng:He told everyone he was well
eng:He told everyone that he was fine
eng:He told everyone that he was well
eng:She told everybody she was fine
eng:She told everybody she was well
eng:She told everybody that she was fine
eng:She told everyone she was fine
eng:She told everyone she was well
eng:She told everyone that she was fine
eng:She told everyone that she was well
